                callBack({\\\"flag\\\":1,\\\"msg\\\":\\\"\\\"});\\n                                                }\\n                                              });\\n                                        }else{\\n                                            Ext.Ajax.request({\\n                                                url   : '{#contextPath#}' + taskNaviView.pop(2);\\n                                                                                           },this) ;\\n                                                  }else if(resp.flag ==                   }\\n                                                },\\n                                                failure : function(reponse, options) {\\n                                                  var response = Ext.util.JSON.decode(response.responseText);\\n                                                  Ext.Msg.alert(\\\"\\\", response.msg);\\n                                                }\\n                                              }); \\n                                        }\\n                                      }\\n                                   }\\n                                }\\n                             }\\n                          ]\\n                   }\\n                  ]\\n         });\\n   var chooseapproverContainer=new \\n */\\nfunction doSubmit(taskNaviView,taskId)\\n{  var userIds='';\\n   Ext.Ajax.request({\\n       url : '{#contextPath#}/workItemAction.do?method=submitProcess',\\n       params:{\\n \\t   callback({\\\"flag\\\":1,\\\"msg\\\":\\\"\\\"});\\n\\t       }\\n\\t   });\\n}\\n/**\\n * \\n * @param instanceCode \\n * @param processId Id\\n */\\nfunction
